title: Takeaway Chinese curry sauce
ingredients: ['1 medium onion, diced', '6 teaspoons Chinese five spice', '4 teaspoons ground ginger', '1 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/2 teaspoon mild chilli powder', '2 tablespoons mild curry powder', '2 teaspoons tomato ketchup', '1 pint chicken stock (made with 2 chicken stock cubes)', '1 tablespoon light soy sauce', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '50ml double cream', '3 teaspoons sugar', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon cornflour, mixed to a paste with a drop of water']
